message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this exceptional product at a competitive price. I believe you'll find it a valuable addition to your collection. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am looking for a lower price. Could we negotiate closer to $10000?

I understand you're looking for a lower price, Bob. However, I need to ensure I get a fair deal for the product. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I can only go down to $12500. This is my best offer at this time.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate your flexibility. Based on my budget, could we discuss a price closer to $11000?

I'm glad we're still in negotiation, Bob. I can see you're serious about the product, but I still need to meet my minimum price. I'm willing to make one more concession. My best offer is $13000. This is the lowest I can go.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I understand your position and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Considering my budget constraints, could we discuss a price closer to $12000?
